short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub file diff to TODO List.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When I see too much diff file, I sometime forget how files I already reviewed.
When you install this chrome extension, you can mark each file diff to "review done" on GitHub.
